content: knitted jacket in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk the piece is worked top down with raglan cable-pattern and v-neck sizes s - xxxl pattern no z-901 yarn group a + a or c **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 250-250-300-300-350-400 g colour 7815 forest mix **and** use drops kid-silk from garnstudio 100-125-125-150-150-175 g colour 19 dark green **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm **needles** drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm for rib drops cable needle for cables drops buttons marble no 629 5-5-5-5-5-5 items
